## Source: ossf-package-analysis (cba011b86ceb83ee613aceb9c55a91e8aabbb2df8d473962bff0b0c55879ce49)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'myuscis-material' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
